mapper.insert:
insert into breeding_batch_parameter (customer_id, plan_id, batch_no, param_id, param_name, day_age, param_type, value_type, lower_limit, upper_limit, unit, alarm, param_value, threshold_direction, status, necessary, enable, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id) values
(#{item.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paramId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dayAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.paramType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.valueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lowerLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.upperLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.alarm,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.thresholdDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.necessary,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
